did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

persname.normal: [give the MARC presentation of creator here, i.e., surname first; include dates]

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One photo album kept by Peirce M. Wood while a student at Cornell University from 1909-1913. The photo album includes photos of the Cornell Campus, Sigma Alpha Epsilon, and Fall Creek.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Peirce M. Wood was a member of the Cornell University Class of 1913. He received his degree in mechanical engineering.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One photo album kept by Peirce M. Wood while a student at Cornell University from 1909-1913. The photo album includes photos of the Cornell Campus, Sigma Alpha Epsilon, and Fall Creek.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Peirce M. Wood Papers, #37-05-3379. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

acqinfo.head: PROVENANCE
acqinfo.p: Transfered by the Flower Sprecher Veterinary Library to the Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections in 2004
